channel.title: [help] Webclient Problems
channel.description:
I have jar'ed and signed the client. i deleted the cache, and the sprites thing. and added the index.php in a http thing heres the code [code]<HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>Your Webclient</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY>
<applet name="i named my client here" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>
</BODY> </HTML>[/code]
and there was no errors in the compile
but for some reason i get this, and the server is online, and works on copy of client with out anything deleted. HELP? [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/xp6fc1.jpg[/img]
